name: Single Serving Queso Fundido
description: Instead of being limited to "group appetizer" status, this single serving Queso Fundido is designed to be a quick meal.
recipeIngredient: 1-2 cups cheese ((Mozzarella, Monterey Jack, or Oaxaca))

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the poblano in the oven at 400F for approx. 10-15 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the poblano in the oven at 400F for approx. 10-15 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Saute the chorizo until cooked and set aside. I used 1/3 of a link for this batch.
recipeInstructions.name: Saute the chorizo until cooked and set aside. I used 1/3 of a link for this batch.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice 2-3 tablespoons of both onion and the roasted poblano, reserving the leftover poblano
recipeInstructions.name: Dice 2-3 tablespoons of both onion and the roasted poblano, reserving the leftover poblano

recipeInstructions.text: Saute the onion in a dollop of oil for a couple minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Saute the onion in a dollop of oil for a couple minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add the poblano to the skillet along with generous dashes of salt and pepper
recipeInstructions.name: Add the poblano to the skillet along with generous dashes of salt and pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chorizo and cook until everything is at a uniform temp
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chorizo and cook until everything is at a uniform temp

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cheese and create a single even layer (using an ovenproof skillet or a baking dish)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cheese and create a single even layer (using an ovenproof skillet or a baking dish)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the oven at 400F for 4-8 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in the oven at 400F for 4-8 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, add the leftover poblano and garlic to a blender along with a 1/4 sliver of the jalapeno
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, add the leftover poblano and garlic to a blender along with a 1/4 sliver of the jalapeno

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2-3 tablespoons of stock (or water) and pulse blend. Salt to taste and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2-3 tablespoons of stock (or water) and pulse blend. Salt to taste and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove dish from oven when cheese is just finishing melting
recipeInstructions.name: Remove dish from oven when cheese is just finishing melting

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately with your choice of chips or warmed up tortillas
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately with your choice of chips or warmed up tortillas
